resources.string: Sofitel Legend Old Cataract Aswan Hotel
Pyramisa Isis Island Resort and Spa Hotel
Corniche El Nil Street, El Corniche, Aswan,Phone:+20 97 2306169
New Corniche, Near Al Mawqaf Al Eqlimy

The ancient Egyptians had carved this obelisk but did not finish it so it was called by that name. The scholars attributed the missing obelisk to the time of Queen Hatshepsut, where many of the obelisks were built in its time, and the obelisk is one of the most important tourist places in Aswan Egypt.

UNESCO has built the Nubia Museum to display the ancient Egyptian monuments and monuments of the Nubians. It includes a large collection of prehistoric and other monuments. The museum also exhibits the Nubian language and Nubian customs and traditions.

The island of El Fentine is one of the most beautiful tourist places in Aswan. It contains a number of temples including the famous Aswan Temple, inhabited by the Nubians, where there are large areas of green land and they rely on tourism in Aswan Egypt where they perform their artistic and manual works.

The island of plants is one of the most beautiful tourist places in Aswan. It is an island located in the middle of the Nile, filled with all kinds of rare plants and trees in the world, and due to the importance of the island and its wide fame has been visited by many famous figures such as Queen Elizabeth and Nehru, Prime Minister of India.

The ancient Philistine temple was built to worship the goddess Isis. The temple was built on the island of Philo and was then transported by UNESCO to the island of Ijelica to protect it from the inevitable drowning after the construction of the High Dam.

The mosque is considered one of the oldest mosques in Aswan, attracting large numbers of tourists and activating tourism in Aswan, Egypt. The mosque was designed with some beautiful decoration from inside and outside belonging to the Mamluk era.

Koum Ombo Temple is located in Kom Ombo, Aswan, where it was built in the Ptolemaic period. It was then attached to some additions in the Roman era. This temple is considered one of the most important tourist places in Aswan Egypt.

It is located on the island of Elephantine, and was built to preserve the effects found during the excavation of the High Dam and also includes the effects of the island of Elephantine and some ancient Nubian monuments, and the museum is one of the most important landmarks Aswan Egypt.

The Upper Aswan Dam or the High Dam is a water dam on the Nile in southern Egypt. It was established during the reign of Gamal Abdel Nasser and assisted the Soviets in its construction. The dam helped greatly control the flow of water and mitigate the effects of the Nile flood.
